channel.title: Server Ip help?
channel.description: Alright im new to the whole owning a server thing ive done everything downloaded the soure gotten ip and stuff. When i do run client and try to log in it says "error connecting to server please try again" do i need to change the old ip of the server (if so how?). And when i try to compile it it says "cannot find patch specified"

item.title: Server Ip help?
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

To fix ‘error connecting’
(client sided)
Go into gui.java and look for the current ip.
Change that the to ip the server is running on.

To fix compiler
Right click it.
‘Edit’
Replace everything with this:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
